name: DOCS_RCVD_ALG_REAC
description: This table stores allergy reactions received from outside sources.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: This item stores the Received Document record ID.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: This is a numeric representation of the date of this encounter in your system. The integer portion of the number specifies the date of the encounter. The digits after the decimal point indicate multiple visits on one day.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: REAC_ALG_REF_ID
columns.description: This item stores the allergy reference identifier that's associated with the reaction.

columns.name: REAC_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the name of the reaction.

columns.name: REAC_ID_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the reaction category value which maps to the one sent by the external source.

columns.name: REAC_CODE
columns.description: This item stores the coded identifier for the reaction.

columns.name: REAC_CODING_SYSTEM
columns.description: This item stores the reaction coding system associated with the code that represents the reaction.

columns.name: REAC_SEVERITY
columns.description: This item stores the reaction severity.

columns.name: REAC_SEVERITY_ID_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the mapped reaction severity.

columns.name: REAC_TYPE_OF_CHNG_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the type of change associated with the reaction.
